Package com.nsl.web.crawling

Class MainCrawler

java.lang.Object
com.nsl.web.crawling.MainCrawler
public abstract class MainCrawler extends Object
Crawler class defining execution of crawling. Inherit this class, implement abstract methods, instantiate the subclass, and then call run() method.
Author:
PGD

  • Constructor Details

    • MainCrawler

      public MainCrawler(String entryUrl)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      entryUrl - where crawling starts.

    • MainCrawler

      public MainCrawler(String entryURL, int threadPoolSize)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      entryURL - where crawling starts.
      threadPoolSize - size of thread pool. If the number of available processors is less than threadPoolSize, the size of the thread pool would be the same as the number of available processors.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public final Set<String> run() throws InterruptedException, RejectedExecutionException
      Start web crawling. After defining abstract functions and set request properties, just call this method to start crawling.
      Returns:
      a set data structure containing failed page urls
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
      RejectedExecutionException - if the task cannot be scheduled for execution

    • setCookie

      public void setCookie(String cookie)
      Set cookies into request. The String should be the following format: [name]=[value];[name]=[value];...;[name]=[value]
      Parameters:
      cookie - name-value pairs of cookie.

    • setCookie

      public void setCookie(Map<String,String> cookie)
      Set cookies into request. The java.util.Map object should contain keys as names of cookies, and values as values of cookies.
      Parameters:
      cookie - name-value pairs of cookie.

    • setRequestProperty

      public void setRequestProperty(Map<String,String> properties)
      Set request properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - key-value pairs of properties.

    • processPage

      protected void processPage(DataContainer<String> htmlContainer, String thisPageUrl)
      Process fetched HTML data. The responsibility to define how to parse the page is on you.
      Parameters:
      htmlContainer - web page data.
      thisPageUrl - URL of the page being processed now.

    • processPage

      protected abstract void processPage(String html, String thisPageUrl)
      Process fetched HTML data. The responsibility to define how to parse the page is on you.
      Parameters:
      html - web page data.
      thisPageUrl - URL of the page being processed now.

    • findNextTargets

      protected abstract List<String> findNextTargets(String html, String thisPageUrl)
      Find target URLs to fetch next. (In DFS method) If the list containing next targets contains visited URLs already, such targets will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      html - current page which finding next targets within
      thisPageUrl - URL of the page being processed now
      Returns:
      a list of target URLs.

    • findNextTargets

      protected List<String> findNextTargets(DataContainer<String> htmlContainer, String thisPageUrl)

    • getFailedPageURLs

      public final Set<String> getFailedPageURLs()
      Return failed URLs.
      Returns:
      conatinig URLs which failed to fetch.
